Articles.Content:
i started a new sandbox game but no matter the flight and what parts were used the i am unable to neither revert flights while i am able to recover crafts except the ones with airplane plus mod parts reverting flights in enabled in difficulty options

ksp log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/r6g8uk8t6zcbk9n/KSP.log?dl=0

debug log: missing

player log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/c208iq0hl60s29t/Player.log?dl=0

mod list:

Edited October 9, 2021 by tonimark

I see this in the logs:
Exception handling event onGameStateSave in class KOSToolbarWindow:System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: Exception of type 'System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException' was thrown.

To me that suggests that KOS is either causing the issue or is failing as a result of it; either way, worth testing without it installed to see if that fixes the issue.

There are also a lot of exceptions being thrown by Janitor's Closet, again try uninstalling that and see if the problem persists.
thanks removed this fixed the problem even fixed kerbal health problem
